TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓您自訂 （或主控描繪） 的外觀詳細資料檢視中的控制項。The event enables you to customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a control in the details view. 引發事件時控制其屬性設定為`true`及其屬性設定為。The event is raised by a control when its property is set to `true` and its property is set to . 傳遞至事件處理常式，請包含相關的資訊繪製，並也提供方法，以協助您繪製的子項目。The passed to the event handler contains information about the to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the subitem. 使用或屬性，以取得要繪製的子項目的父項目有關的資訊。Use the or properties to retrieve information about the parent item of the subitem to draw. 若要擷取本身，使用屬性。To retrieve the itself, use the property. 使用屬性，以擷取表示子項目的其中會顯示資料行標頭。Use the property to retrieve the representing the header of the column in which the subitem is displayed. 使用屬性，以執行實際的繪製所指定的區域內屬性。Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要繪製標準不需要自訂的項目會使用， ，和方法。To draw standard elements that do not need customization, use the , , and methods. 使用屬性，當您想要繪製的子項目的作業系統。Use the property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem. 當您想要自訂特定子項目時，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to customize only specific subitems. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免問題主控描繪，覆寫時，圖形閃爍控制項，並將屬性設`true`。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 這項功能在您的應用程式呼叫時僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列方法。This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何提供自訂活動，抽獎獲得控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 在範例中的控制項有漸層背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 與負數值的子項目會有紅色的前景和黑色背景。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 處理常式事件繪製整個項目的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 處理常式事件繪製的文字值和文字和背景有負值的子項目。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 處理常式事件繪製的各個資料行標頭。A handler for the event draws each column header. A元件提供詳細資料檢視和 [清單] 檢視之間切換的方法。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在清單檢視中，只有引發事件。In the list view, only the event is fired. 在此情況下，文字和背景同時繪製事件處理常式。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所指定的位置是相對於左上角控制項。The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中的應用程式，提供自訂活動，抽獎獲得控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在範例中，處理常式事件繪製的子項目文字值和文字和背景有負值的子項目。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawBackground() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 目前的背景色彩來繪製它的背景。

span.span: Draws the background of the using its current background color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來繪製目前的值會使用標準背景屬性。Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the property. 繪製背景填滿所指定的區域屬性。The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之父代必須設為`false`若要避免覆寫的子項目值的父項目值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法的應用程式，提供自訂活動，抽獎獲得控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在範例中，處理常式事件繪製的子項目文字值和文字和背景有負值的子項目。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，處理時子項目，您不想要自訂的事件。Use this property when handling the event for subitems that you do not want to customize. 如果您將這個屬性設定為`true`，通常使用的目前值就會繪製子項目的， ，和屬性If you set this property to `true`, the subitem will be drawn normally using the current values of the , , and properties > [!NOTE] > 屬性之父代必須設為`false`若要避免覆寫的子項目值的父項目值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#472](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#472)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#472](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#472)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawFocusRectangle(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds) cil managed

param.name: bounds
param.span: 在其內描繪焦點矩形的區域。

span.span: The area within which to draw the focus rectangle.

summary.span: 如果父代 具有焦點，則會繪製 的焦點矩形 (Focus Rectangle)。

span.span: Draws a focus rectangle for the if the parent has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來繪製標準的焦點矩形在子項目周圍。Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the subitem. 焦點矩形是所指定的區域內繪製一個像素`bounds`參數。The focus rectangle is drawn one pixel inside the area specified by the `bounds` parameter. 只有在父項目有焦點，因此您不需要檢查的焦點狀態的項目之前呼叫這個方法時，才繪製它。It is drawn only when the parent item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method. 您可能想要繪製焦點矩形只周圍的第一個子項目 （也就是父項目，這會顯示在第一個資料行） 而不是項目的每一個子項目周圍繪製它。You might want to draw the focus rectangle only around the first subitem (that is, the parent item, which is displayed in the first column) rather than drawing it around every subitem of an item. 這會對應至的正常行為控制何時屬性設定為`false`。This corresponds to the normal behavior of a control when the property is set to `false`. 若要繪製焦點矩形，在第一個子項目周圍，請呼叫方法時，才值為 0。To draw the focus rectangle around the first subitem, call the method only when the value is 0. 控制項不提供能夠選取個別的子項目，但如果您想要自行實作子項目選取項目，您可以使用這個方法來繪製焦點矩形以外的第一個子項目周圍。The control does not provide the ability to select individual subitems, but if you want to implement subitem selection yourself, you can use this method to draw the focus rectangle around a subitem other than the first one.

summary.span: 使用 目前的前景色彩和預設格式來繪製它的文字。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color and the default formatting.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawText() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 目前的前景色彩來繪製它的文字。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來繪製使用的目前值的子項目文字和屬性。Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the and properties. 所指定的區域內繪製文字屬性。The text is drawn within the area specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之父代必須設為`false`若要避免和覆寫的子項目值與父項目值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the and values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawText(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags flags) cil managed

span.span: A bitwise combination of values.

summary.span: 使用 目前的前景色彩繪製它的文字，並利用指定的 值設定格式。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來繪製使用的目前值的子項目文字和屬性。Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the and properties. 所指定的區域內繪製文字屬性。The text is drawn within the area specified by the property. 中指定的值`flags`參數可讓您提供格式設定屬性的節點標籤，例如文字對齊方式。The values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment. > [!NOTE] > 屬性之父代必須設為`false`若要避免和覆寫的子項目值與父項目值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the and values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法的應用程式，提供自訂活動，抽獎獲得控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在範例中，處理常式事件繪製的子項目文字值和文字和背景有負值的子項目。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來存取的父代繪製。Use this property to access the parent of the to draw. 這很有用，當屬性不提供足夠的資訊，以符合您的需求。This is useful when the property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 屬性只會提供基本的狀態資訊，您可以使用，例如，若要判斷是否選取、 核取，或已取得焦點的父項目。The property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused. 屬性，相反地，可讓您存取所有成員之父代。The property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the parent . 若要存取所繪製，使用屬性。To access the being drawn, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. value.span: 值的位元組合，指出父代 目前的狀態。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values indicating the current state of the parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來檢查是否的父代來繪製處於特定狀態。Use this property to check whether the parent of the to draw is in a particular state. 這個屬性只會提供基本的狀態資訊相關的父項目。This property provides only basic state information about the parent item. 您可以使用這個屬性，例如，若要判斷是否選取、 核取，或已取得焦點的父項目。You can use this property, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused. 若要深入了解，擷取父項目，透過屬性，並直接檢查其屬性。If you need to know more, retrieve the parent item through the property and check its properties directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中的應用程式，提供自訂活動，抽獎獲得控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在範例中，處理常式事件繪製的子項目文字值和文字和背景有負值的子項目。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SubItem As ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the to draw.
The to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用另屬性未提供足夠的資訊，以符合您的需求。This method is useful when the other properties do not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 屬性可讓您存取的所有成員所繪製。The property allows you to access all members of the being drawn. 您必須存取此物件直接，比方說，若要繪製值自行點，而不需使用方法。You must access this object directly, for example, to draw the value yourself rather than using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中的應用程式，提供自訂活動，抽獎獲得控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在範例中，處理常式事件繪製的子項目文字值和文字和背景有負值的子項目。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#4)]
